posts.post_content:
The old "T206 Trading Post" was started about a year ago.  It has now about 120 post, and there's a lot of old stuff on there.  So "I" (sorry Luke and Doug ;)) decided it was time to start a FRESH one.

For all us "old" traders, please re-post your most recent stuff.  If you're new to trading, please jump on in.  It's one GREAT way to collect, make new friends, and it's fun - fun - fun :):):):):)

I have a ton of stuff to trade.  Backs, commons, HOFers, graded, raw etc.

posts.post_title: 2 dozen, w. SC460, Sov., Jumbos, 8 h-o-f, SP's--
posts.post_content:
Continually looking to upgrade and diversify my 518.
Generally, looking for ungraded G-Ex commons, F-VG-Ex h-o-f, SL and SP's.
Also looking to diversify backs, particularly SC 350-460, Sovereign, Old Mill, EPDG, Cycle, AB, Tolstoi, and Hindu.

Would prefer to trade, but will sell.
Email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url].  [My pm box is often full.]

Page 1:

5 SC 350-460: 
Geyer, Factory 42 x-out [VG-Mark?--looks like stamped O after "SWEET"],
Meyers, Factory 30, VG,
Murray, Factory 25, trimmed,
Oldring, Factory 25, trimmed on top?  unertain, but I'd guess so.
Murray, Factory 30, Fair+,

Ewing, Hindu, Poor [paper-loss obscuring factory #]--TRADED--

2 Jumbos, Bransfield and Knight portrait, Fair+,--Both TRADED--

Stanage, Old Mill, Fair [X written above Old Mill erased but discernible]--TRADED--

3 Sovereigns:
Chase, white hat, series 150, trimmed--TRADED--
Ford, series 460, [top corners are not consistent with bottom, so I suspect it's trimmed],
Knight batting, series 350, F-G.

Page 2:

8 h-o-f:
Jennings, one hand, VG-,--SOLD--
Chance, orange portrait, P350-460, G-VG,--TRADED--
Huggins portrait, P [pinholes top corners],
Walsh, P [nice front, paper-loss on back],--SOLD--
G. Davis, P+,
Jennings, one hand, Fair [scuffed at pinky]--SOLD--,
McGraw, finger, F,

Pelty horizontal, F,--SOLD--
Gandil, P350-460, G+--SOLD--

posts.post_title: Six more, w. Keeler EPDG, Griffith, Huggins, 2 VG-Ex, one print-bleed
posts.post_content:
I recently bought and cracked open [SGC 10] the Keeler with hopes of soaking the spot on the back clean.  Alas, though the spot lightened, it did not come clean.  Not a bad-looking card for a Poor, though.

Bliss looks to be Ex, but is a little narrow.  Does not appear to be trimmed.

The Graham has pretty much solid red line borders at the bottom back, not much of an anomaly, but I'll trade for oddities like it.

See previous post for eight more, and previous posts for many more--I have close to 200 to trade.

Email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url].  No pm's, please; my PM Box is often full.
I have a double of Mike Donlin for trade.  It's a beater.  Willing to trade for another beater I don't have.
Have over 100 raw T206 cards varying from Poor to Good condition. The cards are mostly commons; some SL and HOF's.  Please message or email if you are interested in working on a 3+ card trade.  :)
Would like to trade for other graded T206s. If I don't have them I want them. Looking in the PSA 2 and beyond range. SGC 30 and beyond are welcome also so long as they aren't loose in the slab.

Looking for a graded 4 or 4.5 SLer that I need. I will trade the 3 SLers in post number 44 plus I am adding this HOFer. I got a few replies to post number 44 that were cards I already have, and one inquiry from a non-responsive collector. Maybe adding this HOFer will pique more interest. 

I can add cash or cards for a graded 5 or a tougher SLer like Foster or Shag. I will also consider a HOFer I need.

Hey Guys,

I've got some oddities to put on the trading block.  SC 350 factory numbers, a few miscuts, and some cool off-register cards.  I value them more than a normal card, so I probably wouldn't want to sell.  Looking for something unique, or middle tier tough backs.
